Restricted            
 
           NO.CAS-6(2)/2010.Div-I(Alert) 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
          Date:    14 /07/2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 16 / 2010 
 
 
Sub:       Screening of Passenger through ETDs 
 
 
 
 
The following checks shall be carried out in all cases of Passenger with 
Plaster Cast:- 
 
(i) 
10% random check by ETD of passenger  is mandatory;  
 
(ii) 
Any suspicious baggage; 
 
(iii) 
100% check of all passenger with Plaster Cast on limb etc. with 
specific check of the Plaster Cast through ETD for hidden 
explosives; and/or 
 
(iv) 
Complete pat down search and luggage inspection must be done.” 
 
 
 
 
 
(Rohit Nandan) 
Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution: As per list attached. 
 
Copy to: 
 
MCA (Shri S. Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary):  w.r.t MCA letter No. 
AV.AV.13024/54/2007-SS dated 24.6.2010
